Welcome to Sudoku’s documentation!¶

This Sudoku project is done because of subject Programovanie(3).

To switch between game mode and running test one have to modify CMakeLists.txt. On the top of the file there is a line that says set(TESTING TRUE). When the variable TESTING is set to TRUE the sudoku will run all the tests. When the testing is set to FALSE the game will start and prompt user to play.

The Sudoku project contains following classes:¶

  • Game
  • Player
    • Functionality
    • Sign in process
  • Sudoku
    • Functionality
    • Variables
    • Saving process
  • Print
